content.rendered:
Hello, I’m Michal

I am a professional front-end and back-end developer with more than 8 years of experience.

In my work, I am focused on creating progressive web apps, which work for every user, regardless of browser choice, fit any form factor like desktop, mobile, tablet, are enhanced with service workers to work offline or on low quality networks and the most important – make users feel that they are using an application, not website.

Currently, I am working at CERN as Full-stack Developer. I am responsible for creating desktop and mobile applications in Vue.js / Vuex, Angular, React / Redux, React Native, Typescript, ES6, HTML5, Bootstrap, Zurb Foundation 6 and Spring Boot / Data / Security.

Moreover, I like to share knowledge on a public forum, especially about front-end technologies.

Out of office, I like to discover new places in Europe, enjoy Italian food, ski in the French Alps, hike in Suisse mountains, practise Latino dance, listen to many kinds of music from around the world 😉

  • Contact me:
  • Mobile and Viber: +41 77 920 2668
  • E-mail: websitescity@gmail.com

Cheers,
